description: The former president of France, who has died aged 94, was a force for greater European integration.
title: Giscard d'Estaing: France mourns ex-president, dead at 94
title_page: Giscard d'Estaing: France mourns ex-president, dead at 94 - BBC News
maintext: In 2005, he and his brother purchased the castle of Estaing in the French district of Aveyron, which had previously been owned by Admiral d'Estaing. Giscard d'Estaing's family had no direct connection with the deceased naval officer and there was much criticism that he was attempting to buy his way into the nobility.
